baselineArmManifestLocation.description: The baseline ARM manifest location supplied to the checkin manifest operation.

environment.description: The environment supplied to the checkin manifest operation.

nextLink.description: The URL to get to the next set of results, if there are any.
The URL to get to the next set of results, if there are any.

details.description: Array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innerError.description: Object containing more specific information than  the current object about the error.

InnerError.description: Inner error containing list of errors.

code.description: Specific error code than was provided by the containing error.

innerError.description: Object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

nextLink.description: The URL to get to the next set of results, if there are any.

isDataAction.description: Indicates whether the operation applies to data-plane.

nextLink.description: The URL to get to the next set of results, if there are any.
The URL to get to the next set of results, if there are any.
The URL to get to the next set of results, if there are any.

proxyResource.description: The resource model definition for a Azure Resource Manager proxy resource. It will not have tags and a location
proxyResource.title: Proxy Resource

resource.description: Common fields that are returned in the response for all Azure Resource Manager resources
resource.title: Resource

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

FilterParameter.description: An OData $filter clause. Used to filter results that are returned in the GET response.
FilterParameter.name: $filter

ProviderNamespaceParameter.description: The name of the resource provider hosted within ProviderHub.
ProviderNamespaceParameter.name: providerNamespace

SelectParameter.description: An OData $select clause. Used to select the properties to be returned in the GET response.
SelectParameter.name: $select
